data.message: 'Rap God' rapper Eminem is still 50 Cent's favorite white boy http://www.asiastarz.com/articles/870/20160107/50-cent-eminem-still-favorite-white-boy.htm?exe=reporter

Eminem a rap God? You are a comedian, the rap Gods are Rakim, Ice Cube, RunDMC, LL, Snoop, Drake, BIG, these are rappers that other rappers came after and tried to emulate, who ever tried to copy Eminem?
No one can copy Em. You also whack asf if you think Drake is a rap god.
